name: Tempeh Tacos
author: Shauntea
summary: Taco 'meat' using tempeh. Serve in taco shells or fajitas. Or, if you're watching carbs, serve with a salad.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package spicy flavored tempeh, coarsely grated
directions: Heat oil in skillet on medium-high heat
Cook and stir onion in the hot oil until it begins to soften, about 5 minutes; add garlic and continue to cook until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes
Stir grated tempeh into onion mixture; cook and stir until lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Pour vegetable broth over the tempeh mixture and reduce heat to low; season with  , oregano, and ground red pepper
Cook, stirring regularly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 5 minutes
